entry.title: Linux: Scheduled Jobs With crontab
entry.summary:
Today I learned about crontab, which for those of us coming from the Windows world is the equivalent of the Windows Task Scheduler. If I had known how easy it was to use I would have started using it a long time ago.
HowToGeek has a great detailed write

entry.title: AWS: Hosting a Static Website in S3
entry.summary: My team at work has decided to adopt the Thoughtworks Technology Radar as a means to communicate what our team is working on at a high level. One of our team members found a project on Github that uses an SVG library to create a Tech Radar graph client
